com.ibm.avatar.api.tam

Interface ViewMetadata

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    public interface ViewMetadata
extends Serializable
    This class provides APIs to retrieve view metadata of the exported and the output views of a given module. An instance of ViewMetadata can be obtained by the API: ModuleMetadata.getViewMetadata(String).
    See Also:
    ModuleMetadata

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getComment()
      Returns the text of the AQL doc comment associated with this view.
      CostRecord getCostRecord()
      Returns the cost record associated with this view.
      String getExternalName()
      Returns the external name of the view as declared by create external view statement's external_name clause.
      String getModuleName()
      Returns the name of the module where this view is declared.
      String getOutputAlias()
      Returns the alias name declared through the output view statement's as alias clause; null if the alias is not declared.
      String getViewName()
      Returns the unqualified view name as declared by the create view or create external view statement.
      TupleSchema getViewSchema()
      Returns the schema of the view.
      boolean isExported()
      Returns true, if the view is marked as exported using the export view statement, false otherwise.
      boolean isExternal()
      Returns true, only if the view is declared through the create external view statement, false otherwise.
      boolean isOutputView()
      Returns true, if the view is marked as an output view through the output view statement, false otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • getViewName

        String getViewName()
        Returns the unqualified view name as declared by the create view or create external view statement.
        Returns:
        the unqualified view name as declared in create view or create external view statement

      • getComment

        String getComment()
        Returns the text of the AQL doc comment associated with this view. The text of the original comment is processed as follows:
        • Leading comment separator (/**) and trailing comment separator (*/) are removed
        • Leading asterisk (*) characters on each line are discarded; blanks and tabs preceding the initial asterisk (*) characters are also discarded. If you omit the leading asterisk on a line, the leading white space is not removed.
        • Carriage return characters (\r) are removed.
        Returns:
        the text of the AQL doc comment with leading (begin AQL doc comment) and trailing (end AQL doc comment) separators discarded, leading consecutive whitespace followed by an asterisk on each line of the comment also discarded, carriage return characters (\r) also discarded

      • getViewSchema

        TupleSchema getViewSchema()
        Returns the schema of the view.
        Returns:
        the schema of the view

      • isOutputView

        boolean isOutputView()
        Returns true, if the view is marked as an output view through the output view statement, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true, if the view is marked as an output view through the output view statement, false otherwise

      • isExported

        boolean isExported()
        Returns true, if the view is marked as exported using the export view statement, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true, if the view is marked as exported using the export view statement, false otherwise

      • isExternal

        boolean isExternal()
        Returns true, only if the view is declared through the create external view statement, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true, only if the view is declared through the create external view statement, false otherwise

      • getCostRecord

        CostRecord getCostRecord()
        Returns the cost record associated with this view. This is consumed by the optimizer to compute the cost of views which depends on this view.
        Returns:
        the cost record associated with this view

      • getModuleName

        String getModuleName()
        Returns the name of the module where this view is declared.
        Returns:
        name of module to which this view belongs

      • getOutputAlias

        String getOutputAlias()
        Returns the alias name declared through the output view statement's as alias clause; null if the alias is not declared.
        Returns:
        the alias name declared through the 'output view statement as alias clause; null if the alias is not declared.

      • getExternalName

        String getExternalName()
        Returns the external name of the view as declared by create external view statement's external_name clause. For non-external views this method returns null.
        Returns:
        the external name of the view as declared by create external view statement's external_name clause. For non-external views this method returns null.
